{{Location Intro|description=<p>It is a small chamber branching off the east side of [[Duat Hall]], which the player will access during the {{Quest|Dual Evidence}}. Completing its puzzles grants '''Clearance Level 4''' for the [[Scarlet Sand Slate]].</p>}} 

==Descriptions==
{{Description|Those who ascend to Aaru shall forget hunger and thirst, and even should they sup of the juice of pomegranates, they shall do so for pleasure rather than survival.|[[Scarlet Sand Slate#Delving Deeper|Scarlet Sand Slate: Delving Deeper]]}}
